Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.Graphics

Class BoardButton

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.AbstractButton
javax.swing.JButton
it.polimi.ingsw.View.Graphics.BoardButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class BoardButton
extends javax.swing.JButton
this class represent the button of the Map and it's used mainly to override the repainting of the button if there is a worker or a construction on it
See Also:

    • canBuildIn

      public boolean canBuildIn​(BoardButton destination)
      it's used to know if a worker in the cell represented by the button can build in a specific cell
      Parameters:
      destination - represent where you want to know if you can build
      Returns:
      true if you can build in the destination cell or false if you can't

    • canMoveTo

      public boolean canMoveTo​(BoardButton destination, Divinity power)
      it's used to know if a worker in the cell represented by the button can move in a specific cell using eventualy a specific GodPower
      Parameters:
      destination - represent the cell where you want to move in
      power - represent the power that you are using to move or Default if are not using any GodPower
      Returns:
      true if you can move to the destination cell or false if you can't
